arrive.defaultInstruction: You have arrived at your {nth} destination
arrive.left: You have arrived at your {nth} destination, on the left
arrive.right: You have arrived at your {nth} destination, on the right
arrive.sharp left: You have arrived at your {nth} destination, sharply to the left
arrive.sharp right: You have arrived at your {nth} destination, sharply to the right
arrive.slight right: You have arrived at your {nth} destination, slightly to the right
arrive.straight: You have arrived at your {nth} destination, straight ahead

end of road.defaultInstruction: Turn {modifier}[ onto {way_name}] at the end of the road
end of road.uturn: Make a U-turn[ onto {way_name}] at the end of the road

fork.slight left: Keep left at the fork[ onto {way_name}]
fork.slight right: Keep right at the fork[ onto {way_name}]
fork.sharp left: Take a sharp left at the fork[ onto {way_name}]
fork.sharp right: Take a sharp right at the fork[ onto {way_name}]

off ramp.left: Take the ramp on the left
off ramp.right: Take the ramp on the right
off ramp.slight left: Take the ramp on the left
off ramp.slight right: Take the ramp on the right

on ramp.left: Take the ramp on the left
on ramp.right: Take the ramp on the right
on ramp.sharp left: Take the ramp on the left
on ramp.sharp right: Take the ramp on the right
on ramp.slight left: Take the ramp on the left
on ramp.slight right: Take the ramp on the right

pushing bike.defaultInstruction: Get off the bike and push[ onto {way_name}]

roundabout turn.defaultInstruction: At the roundabout make a {modifier}[ onto {way_name}]
roundabout turn.left: At the roundabout turn left[ onto {way_name}]
roundabout turn.right: At the roundabout turn right[ onto {way_name}]
